comment: Maury was great. He is a bit nonchalant but we love him for it. Take this class for an easy A.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: super easy A, grades really easy and he responds quickly to emails

Easiest class I have taken at KSU. 4 Discussion Boards, 3 Tests, and a "paper" (8-16 sentences). Discussions felt like they were completion, tests were incredibly easy. Visit to Museum is required, but that exists in all art classes, not just this one. Responds very quickly to emails. You will not regret taking this class.

His lectures are entertaining and interesting. The class was easy and I was able to get an A by just showing up and learning while doing homework for harder classes. Definitely take this guy you won't regret it!
Pretty straightforward class. Attendance wasn't mandatory but his lectures were interesting.
I took his art 1107 online. It was super easy. Few discussion post and test(quizlet) and one paper.

TAKE HIM. I cannot stress this enough this is the easiest class I have ever taken. You only have to do 4 discussion posted for the ENTIRE semester, I felt like I wasn't doing enough so i did more and he literally emailed me to stop. He is honestly such a great professor take him.

Pretty easy, the only thing I did not like was the midterm exam, I studied but still got a C. So beware of that. Other than that, great guy, he loves his work and just photography in general. He made us think outside of the box about what is good photography. He doesn't laugh or smile much, but still a great guy and teacher.

Super nice professor who cares about the students. Teaches very clearly, gives great feedback on work. This class really made me inspired in photography. He knows what he's talking about and cares about the subject. Light workload and lenient class. Attendance wasn't always mandatory.
He's a chill guy
a chill guy
rating_tags: Respected--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Discussion posts 25% every weekish, creative assignments 25% every other week, 4 exams 50%. All the work is fairly easy but interesting. Requires textbook but I didn't buy it and haven't had a problem. His lectures can get longggg. If you don't have the attention span, just read the slides he posts. Creative assignments are actually kind of fun.
I love this class! The course work was easy to follow and complete, and grading was super chill. Take this class for an easy A!

His class is graded well, if you do a good job you will get a b or a, he is very helpful, and has a lot of knowledge about photography. My only downfall would be some of the lectures get long and lengthy.

I took Professor Gortemiller this past fall. Keep in mind as I am writing this he may have been different as everyone has been affected by the pandemic. The online class consisted of long recorded lectures, 4 tests each with 3 bonus questions, discussion posts each week, and creative assignments every other week. Easy class, but boring online.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Great professor overall.

Good, caring and passionate. Not his fault but the most boring class I've ever had to take. Don't even have to show up and you'll pass- just study the slides (puts them online) and your textbook art photos (those will throw you off on the test if ur not prepared). Handled COVID transition well- but added more weekly work.

Very clear what you need to do to make a good grade... He is a good teacher and I enjoyed his lectures. His study guides are the test... so study. He gives quite a lot due at the end... some projects and journals, but they are fun and I liked them! Take him!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Easy class- gives a very clear study guide that tells you EXACTLY what you need to know for the tests. I got the online textbook at the beginning of the year and ended up never using it. Funny, chill, easy-going professor- take him if you can!
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: Easy A he was extremely nice and gives study guide for test and its all on the test

Easiest class I've ever taken. Show up once in a while for tests and the occasional lecture and his class is an easy A. There is quite a bit due at the end of the semester but nothing difficult and he is a very lenient grader. I would recommend for anyone needing an art credit. You can also learn a lot by going to class but it is not necessary.
Great professor, made this class an easy A.
I have never been interested in art, so this was just a class I was required to take. Super easy to get an A. He gives study guides for all of the tests. Highly recommend taking him.

This class was an easy A. He does not require you to come to class. He has 4 tests, but drops lowest grade. There are photography and journal assignments but they're easy. He also gives out detailed study guides. Students made quizlets for the tests and that's what got me through lol.
You don't even have to go to make an A, but he is a very good and passionate professor. 10 out of 10 recommend.

Such an awesome professor! Passionate about art and willing to help his students. If you study your study guide, you will get an A. I respect him highly!! You need to take Art in Society with him over any other art teacher or theater or music course.

This class is an easy A. you don't need to show up to class only on review days. gives a study guide and its exactly like the test. you don't need the text book do not buy it. you are going to get an A
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Pretty nice guy. Tests come from the study guide which comes from the lectures, so it's pretty easy. Your grade is 4 tests and a couple projects. I never come to class and have a solid A.
Awesome prof. Super knowledgeable about all the art. He sends all the power points, he gives a study guide, and the tests are easy. Although, you will have to buy your own scantron. Easy A!!
Super easy tests and a few projects. Very easy class highly recommend.

He seems to be knowledgeable about all the art he talks about. He posts all powerpoints online. Book is needed if you don't go to class. He gives you study guides and if you do them, you will get an A on the tests. I highly recommend him to get a gen ed out of the way! Great teacher!!

Super easy! I never went to class and still got an A. There are 4 test, one of which he drops. Attendance isn't mandatory and there is only one art even that you have to attend and write a short paper on!
overall he is inexperienced, unclear about most topics such as events, tests and etc.
